org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.symbols

Interface ISymbol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IPrintable, Persistent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicSymbol, IFillSymbol, ILineSymbol, IMarkerFillSymbol, IMarkerSymbol, IMarkerSymbol_v2, IMultiLayerFillSymbol, IMultiLayerLineSymbol, IMultiLayerMarkerSymbol, IMultiLayerSymbol, IPictureFillSymbol, IPictureLineSymbol, IPictureMarkerSymbol, ISimpleFillSymbol, ISimpleLineSymbol, ISimpleMarkerSymbol, ISimpleTextSymbol, ISymbol_v2, ITextSymbol, IWarningSymbol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFillSymbol, AbstractLineSymbol, AbstractMarkerSymbol, AbstractSymbol, ArrowMarkerSymbol, CharacterMarkerSymbol, DefaultDynamicSymbol, MarkerFillSymbol, MultiLayerFillSymbol, MultiLayerLineSymbol, MultiLayerMarkerSymbol, MultiShapeSymbol, PictureFillSymbol, PictureLineSymbol, PictureMarkerSymbol, SimpleFillSymbol, SimpleLineSymbol, SimpleMarkerSymbol, SimpleTextSymbol, SmartTextSymbol, WarningSymbol

    public interface ISymbol
extends Persistent, IPrintable, Cloneable
    Interface for symbols.It is the most general one which is implemented by other specific symbols.For this reason this interface has a method to obtain the derived version of a common symbol(apart from others). The main purpose is to offer a set of symbols that will be part of the FMap kernel and allow the developer to add new symbols without changes in the initial implementation.

      • isSuitableFor

        boolean isSuitableFor(Geometry geom)

      • drawInsideRectangle

        void drawInsideRectangle(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                         java.awt.geom.AffineTransform scaleInstance,
                         java.awt.Rectangle r)
                  throws SymbolDrawingException
        Useful to render the symbol inside the TOC, or inside little rectangles. For example, think about rendering a Label with size in meters => You will need to specify a size in pixels. Of course, you can also to choose to render a prepared image, etc.
        Parameters:

        r -
        g2 -
        Throws:
